Case Study

Worship Planning

AI-Assisted Worship & Team Coordination

Built an AI-assisted worship planning app that connects scripture-based theme analysis, intelligent song selection, team scheduling, and email communication using Google Workspace tools.

Visit live site View repository

Challenge

What they needed

A growing church needed a better way to plan worship services by connecting scripture, themes, song selection, and volunteer scheduling—while coordinating communication across a rotating team.

Approach

How we solved it

Designed and built a nonprofit-focused web application that integrates Google Spreadsheets and Google Documents with AI-powered logic. The app analyzes scripture text to determine service themes, selects appropriate worship songs from an existing Google Docs song database, manages team scheduling with exclusion dates, and provides built-in email communication for upcoming services.

Completed

January 2026

Website

https://bel-caylor.github.io/worship-plan-ts/

Repository

https://github.com/bel-caylor/worship-plan-ts

Stack highlights

  • Google Sheets
  • Google Docs
  • AI Integration
  • REST API
  • JavaScript
  • Alpine.js
